Special Powers
(+10) I REALLY SHOULD DEACTIVATE THESE DOOMBOTS: When a friendly character is targeted by an opponent's Outwit, Perplex or Probability Control, after resolutions you may generate a [F4] #005 Doombot. (Each time.)
SUMMON GALACTUS, MY SON: PROTECTED: Pulse Wave. // POWER: Once per game, generate a Franklin Galactus bystander.
STRETCH MY OWN BRAIN TO THE LIMIT: Outwit, Perplex. // FREE: Choose Outwit or Perplex. Dr. Fantastic can use the chosen power an additional time this turn.

February 19, 2021
Goop
I really like his +10 trait pretty much guaranteeing your opponent is not going to prob or outwit you and the fact you can double outwit or perplex them. Problem is for a 100 or 110 pts his atk/dmg is pretty low. You really HAVE to get your Franklin out on the last 2 clicks to make him worth it. Under 2021 rules you can't push to it now and opponents can look at your dial to make sure they don't knock you on it.

I would instead perplex his defense twice and have it be 21, or 22 in hindering and make it hard to take Reed Doom down, plus he will still have Franklin "Big G" Richards if he needs him later.
